mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (order_id, menu_detail_id, name, amount) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{menuDetailId}, #{name}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_detail_id, o.order_id, o.menu_detail_id , o.name, o.amount, o.created_time, o.updated_time , m.price AS unitPrice, m.size, m.size_name, m.temperature , (SELECT menu_name FROM menu WHERE menu_id = m.menu_id) AS menu_name , (SELECT img FROM menu WHERE menu_id = m.menu_id) AS img FROM order_detail o INNER JOIN menu_detail m ON o.menu_detail_id = m.menu_detail_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
